title: t206 Lenox Brown Back - Jordan Batting

posts.post_title: t206 Lenox Brown Back - Jordan Batting
posts.post_content:
Have a nice well loved Lenox Brown Back for sale - Tim Jordan Batting -  but hey, it's a Lenox Brown back.  looks like only 4 graded. $old, or if u are close by can meet up, I will also be at the National.  PM with serious offers or if u need additional details.  thanks!  Cliff

reducing to $5750. PM with questions. card will be availabe for inspection at the National.  thanks!

if no interest will send to auction.

hey fellas!  i will have the card at the national if anyone wants to inspect in person.

TTYL!

Cliff
